text: If I were a tramp I would simply blow a feather," she decided, rather envying the gentleman of the road his freedom of decision, and wishing life would sometimes accordingly. "If I were needing a job I'd go to London, of course," she went on.
handwritten_text: If I were a tramp I would simply blow a feather," she decided, rather envying the gentleman of the road his freedom of decision, and wishing life would sometimes accordingly. "If I were needing a job I'd go to London, of course," she went on.
